channel.title: Authors on Nelson Kibinge
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Nelson Kibinge

item.description: Nelson Kibinge is a senior scientist with the Biomarkers and Bionformatics team at Orion Pharma. His interests include development of statistical and computational tools for genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics and metabolomics data mining. He is involved in diverse research areas including brain disorders, autoimmune diseases, malaria and respiratory virus epidemiology. He has experience in biomarker and therapeutic target prioritization. Before joining Orion was a senior research associate at the University of Bristol. He is also affiliated to the KEMRI-Wellcome Trust Research Program, a unique center of scientific research excellence in Africa and is also a part-time lecturer at the Pwani University department of Biochemistry.
